text:
It could be great that Tag in Blog would be editable in name AND in slug...
Example : in France we have tag named "Opérateur" automatically with "opérateur" slug however I would like to use "operateur" without accent...

You can actually update the tag `slug` through the api if you need to, but unfortunately next time you update the name we will likely set it back to what it was before (we try and smartly set a slug which matches the name you set)

Within HubDB it would be excellent if there was the option to Add Column before/ Add Column after existing columns.  Sometimes when working on a large table, it gets a little frustrating to add new columns and then position them appropriately
Thanks <@U6W3H6YN8> for your quick answer. Do you think it's something that could be implemented by HubSpot ? URL and SEO don't like special characters .... Have a great year !
Is having Flexible Columns in Emails a possibility?
Pretty sure it's a no according to various HubSpot Ideas articles
Though the Beta Drag and Drop email editor seems to have flex functionality

:bulb: Inside of the Module Preview, it would be cool if we could have a pane that we can toggle to show the JSON markup as well, this way we can make use of the additional JSON attributes on fields without having to publish to a page first then looking at the developer info.
